org_midgardproject_projectsite_document.title: Installing MidCOM with PEAR
org_midgardproject_projectsite_document.content: <div><p>MidCOM releases are shipped as PEAR packages for better version management and control. The packages utilize a MidCOM-specific channel in <a href="http://ragnaroek.pear.midgard-project.org/">ragnaroek.pear.midgard-project.org</a>.</p></div><div><p>The Datagard tool in Midgard1 performs all required steps to initialize all channels (Ragnaroek, HTMLPurifier, etc) and install all initial base packages. If you are only interested in installing PEAR packages, run datagard with desired action type:</p></div><div><pre># datagard -a pear</pre></div><div><p>Keep in mind, that PEAR action removes old MidCOM if found, and install new packages from new channel.</p></div><div><h3>Useful information:</h3></div><div><ul><li><b>Channel URL:</b> ragnaroek.pear.midgard-project.org</li><li><b>Channel alias:</b> ragnaroek</li></ul></div><div><p>If, for some reason, some package is not installed or it's not included in base packages, install it manually:</p></div><div><pre># datagard -a pear -p package_name</pre><br />When a package is installed via Datagard, the tool will take care of all the necessary actions like updating Midgard database tables.</div>
